verses.verse: And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Chisel <S%H6458><s%> you two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> like unto the first <S%H7223><s%>: and I will write <S%H3789><s%> upon these tablets <S%H3871><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that were in the first <S%H7223><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%>, which you broke <S%H7665><s%>.

And be ready <S%H3559><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and come up <S%H5927><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> unto mountain <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, and present <S%H5324><s%> yourself there to me in the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%>.

And no man <S%H376><s%> shall come up <S%H5927><s%> with you <S%H408><s%>, neither let any man <S%H376><s%> be seen <S%H7200><s%> throughout all the mountain <S%H2022><s%>; neither let the flocks <S%H6629><s%> nor herds <S%H1241><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> before <S%H4136><s%> that mountain <S%H2022><s%>.

And he chiseled <S%H6458><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> like unto the first <S%H7223><s%>; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> rose up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and went up <S%H5927><s%> unto mountain <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> him <S%H3947><s%>, and took in his hand <S%H3027><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> descended <S%H3381><s%> in the cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and stood <S%H3320><s%> with him there <S%H7121><s%>, and proclaimed the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> passed by <S%H5674><s%> before him <S%H6440><s%>, and proclaimed <S%H7121><s%>, The Lord <S%H3068><s%>, The Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H410><s%>, merciful <S%H7349><s%> and gracious <S%H2587><s%>, longsuffering <S%H750><s%>, and abundant <S%H7227><s%> in goodness <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%>,

Keeping <S%H5341><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> for thousands <S%H505><s%>, forgiving <S%H5375><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> and transgression <S%H6588><s%> and sin <S%H2403><s%>, and that will by no means <S%H5352><s%> clear <S%H5352><s%> the guilty <S%H6485><s%>; visiting the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> upon the sons <S%H1121><s%>, and upon the children <S%H1121><s%>'s sons <S%H8029><s%>, unto the third and to the fourth generation <S%H7256><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> made hurry <S%H4116><s%>, and bowed his head <S%H6915><s%> toward the earth <S%H776><s%>, and worshiped <S%H7812><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, If now I have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in your sight <S%H5869><s%>, O Lord <S%H136><s%>, let my Lord <S%H136><s%>, I pray you <S%H3212><s%>, go among <S%H7130><s%> us <S%H7186><s%>; for it is a stiffnecked people <S%H5971><s%>; and pardon <S%H5545><s%> our iniquity <S%H5771><s%> and our sin <S%H2403><s%>, and take us for your inheritance <S%H5157><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H3772><s%>, I make a covenant <S%H1285><s%>: before all your people <S%H5971><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> marvels <S%H6381><s%>, such as have not been done <S%H1254><s%> in all the earth <S%H776><s%>, nor in any nation <S%H1471><s%>: and all the people <S%H5971><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> which you are shall see <S%H7200><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: for it is a terrible thing <S%H3372><s%> that I will do with you <S%H6213><s%>.

Observe <S%H8104><s%> you that which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>: behold <S%H1644><s%>, I drive out before <S%H6440><s%> you the Amorite <S%H567><s%>, and the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%>, and the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, and the Perizzite <S%H6522><s%>, and the Hivite <S%H2340><s%>, and the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%>.

Take care <S%H8104><s%> to yourself <S%H3772><s%>, lest you make a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> where you go <S%H935><s%>, lest it be for a snare <S%H4170><s%> in the middle of you <S%H7130><s%>:
But you shall destroy <S%H5422><s%> their altars <S%H4196><s%>, break <S%H7665><s%> their images <S%H4676><s%>, and cut down <S%H3772><s%> their groves <S%H842><s%>:
For you shall worship <S%H7812><s%> no other <S%H312><s%> god <S%H410><s%>: for the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> is Jealous <S%H7067><s%>, is a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God <S%H410><s%>:

Lest you make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, and they go a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their gods <S%H430><s%>, and do sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> unto their gods <S%H430><s%>, and one call <S%H7121><s%> you <S%H398><s%>, and you eat of his sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>;

And you take <S%H3947><s%> of their daughters <S%H1323><s%> unto your sons <S%H1121><s%>, and their daughters <S%H1323><s%> go a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their gods <S%H430><s%>, and make <S%H2181><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> go a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their gods <S%H430><s%>.
You shall make <S%H6213><s%> you no cast metal <S%H4541><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>.

The feast <S%H2282><s%> of unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> shall you keep <S%H8104><s%>. Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>, as I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H4150><s%>, in the time of the month <S%H2320><s%> Abib <S%H24><s%>: for in the month <S%H2320><s%> Abib <S%H24><s%> you came out <S%H3318><s%> from Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

All that opens <S%H6363><s%> the womb <S%H7358><s%> is mine <S%H6363><s%>; and every firstborn among your cattle <S%H4735><s%>, whether ox <S%H7794><s%> or sheep <S%H7716><s%>, that is male <S%H2142><s%>.

But the firstborn <S%H6363><s%> of an donkey <S%H2543><s%> you shall redeem <S%H6299><s%> with a lamb <S%H7716><s%>: and if you redeem <S%H6299><s%> him not <S%H6202><s%>, then shall you break his neck. All the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of your sons <S%H1121><s%> you shall redeem <S%H6299><s%>. And none shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me empty <S%H7387><s%>.

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall work <S%H5647><s%>, but on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall rest <S%H7673><s%>: in plowing time <S%H2758><s%> and in harvest <S%H7105><s%> you shall rest <S%H7673><s%>.

And you shall observe <S%H6213><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of weeks <S%H7620><s%>, of the firstfruits <S%H1061><s%> of wheat <S%H2406><s%> harvest <S%H7105><s%>, and the feast <S%H2282><s%> of harvest <S%H614><s%> at the year <S%H8141><s%>'s end <S%H8622><s%>.

Three times <S%H6471><s%> in the year <S%H8141><s%> shall all your men children <S%H2138><s%> appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H113><s%> God <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

For I will cast out <S%H3423><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H7337><s%>, and enlarge your borders <S%H1366><s%>: neither shall any man <S%H376><s%> desire <S%H2530><s%> your land <S%H776><s%>, when you shall go up <S%H5927><s%> to appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> thrice <S%H6471><s%> in the year <S%H8141><s%>.

You shall not offer <S%H7819><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of my sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> with yeast <S%H2557><s%>; neither shall the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the feast <S%H2282><s%> of the passover <S%H6453><s%> be left <S%H3885><s%> unto the morning <S%H1242><s%>.

The first <S%H7225><s%> of the firstfruits <S%H1061><s%> of your land <S%H127><s%> you shall bring <S%H935><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>. You shall not boil <S%H1310><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%> in his mother <S%H517><s%>'s milk <S%H2461><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Write <S%H3789><s%> you these words <S%H1697><s%>: for after the tone <S%H6310><s%> of these words <S%H1697><s%> I have made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you and with Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And he was there with the Lord <S%H3068><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%>; he did neither eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>, nor drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>. And he wrote <S%H3789><s%> upon the tablets <S%H3871><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, the ten <S%H6235><s%> commandments <S%H1697><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H4872><s%>, when Moses came down <S%H3381><s%> from mountain <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> with the two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of testimony <S%H5715><s%> in Moses <S%H4872><s%>' hand <S%H3027><s%>, when he came down <S%H3381><s%> from the mountain <S%H2022><s%>, that Moses <S%H4872><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not that the skin <S%H5785><s%> of his face <S%H6440><s%> shone <S%H7160><s%> while he talked with him <S%H1696><s%>.

And when Aaron <S%H175><s%> and all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, behold <S%H5785><s%>, the skin of his face <S%H6440><s%> shone <S%H7160><s%>; and they were afraid <S%H3372><s%> to come near him <S%H5066><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> unto them <S%H175><s%>; and Aaron and all the rulers <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> unto him <S%H4872><s%>: and Moses talked with them <S%H1696><s%>.

And afterward <S%H310><s%> all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came near <S%H5066><s%>: and he gave them in commandment <S%H6680><s%> all that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> with him in mountain <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%>.
And when Moses <S%H4872><s%> had done <S%H3615><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> with them <S%H5414><s%>, he put a veil <S%H4533><s%> on his face <S%H6440><s%>.

But when Moses <S%H4872><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> with him <S%H5493><s%>, he took the veil <S%H4533><s%> off <S%H5493><s%>, until he came out <S%H3318><s%>. And he came out <S%H3318><s%>, and spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that which he was commanded <S%H6680><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>, that the skin <S%H5785><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>' face <S%H6440><s%> shone <S%H7160><s%>: and Moses <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H7725><s%> the veil <S%H4533><s%> upon his face <S%H6440><s%> again <S%H7725><s%>, until he went <S%H935><s%> in to speak with him <S%H1696><s%>.
